product: KitchenAid Mixer Artisan Tilt-Head Stand 5-qt. Mixer
description: This all-metal, 325-watt Artisan KitchenAid Mixer is a good reason for you to get busy in the kitchen. With a 5 qt. ultra durable stainless steel mixing bowl and 10 speed settings, this tilt-back-head, high-performance mixer is an essential.

product: Raffael Carved Wood Bar Cabinet with Storage
description: A carved honeycomb pattern wraps Raffael's mango wood exterior in conversation-sparking texture and dimension. Stained antique brown, each facet of the intricately carved door fronts highlights the wood's lively grain. Set on a minimalist base of gunmetal-finished iron, the cabinet makes a sculptural addition to a living room or study. Open the doors and Raffael is ready for cocktail hour, with room to store bottles and bar tools, and a rack to hold up to 15 wine glasses.
Made of melamine. Phthalate, BPA and lead free. Dishwasher safe; top rack only. Not recommended for use in microwave. Imported.Overall: 13.5l x 10.5w x 3h Capacity: 4.25 qts

Light up the night with this stunning outdoor firepit. Crafted of iron in sleek black, the design-conscious outdoor fireplace elevates the bowl on an open rectangle, creating the illusion of a floating fire. Intended for patios, lawns or pavement, the wood-burning firepit includes a spark screen and poker tool.
Use these sturdy glass bowls for preparing, serving and storing your food. Safe for use in the oven, microwave, refrigerator and freezer.

product: Our Table White Marble Mortar and Pestle Set
description: Handcrafted. Half-sphere-shaped pestle head provides maximum surface contact
Create a starry display with our unique mobile. The muted tones complement a neutral nursery with style, while the celestial and elephant designs help sooth baby to sleep as a sweet song plays.

Expertly crafted with sustainable pine, our Penny 2-in-1 Convertible Crib adds a classic touch to your child’s room. Resting on turned legs and detailed with scalloped molding, this durable design grows with them over the years, from newborn to toddler. It also reflects a touch of European influence with its elegant, water-based French White finish. Plus, it’s GREENGUARD Gold Certified to promote cleaner indoor air for a healthy home.

Celestial prints and monochrome hues give this swaddle set its sweetly modern style. Soft, breathable and durable, the organic cotton muslin is gentle on baby’s skin and GOTS Certified for a healthier nursery. Packaged in a box, they're a great option for gifting.

product: Kendall Extra-Wide Nursery Dresser & Topper Set
description: Beautifully made and incredibly versatile, our Kendall Collection features Craftsman-inspired details that coordinate with nearly any style.

Designed for playful discovery, this activity gym features a plush elephant and rainbow, a balloon rattle, a crinkly circle, squeaky cloud, plush lights and music to engage all their senses. Supersoft fabric and padding make it comfy for lying and sitting.
Give them a double dose of love with this sweet elephant friend. Featuring soothing sounds and cuddly softness, this adorable elephant will become their new best friend.

product: Keurig K-Mini Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker
description: The Keurig K-Mini single serve coffee maker features a sleek design with matte finish, and at less than 5 inches wide is the perfect size for any space or occasion. The K-Mini brewer is effortlessly simple to use - just add fresh water to the reservoir, pop in your favorite K-Cup pod, press the brew button and enjoy fresh brewed, delicious coffee in minutes.

product: Whirlpool 2.7 cu ft Mini Refrigerator - Stainless Steel - WH27S1E
description: Keep all your go-to snacks and beverages cool with the Whirlpool Mini Refrigerator. It's equipped to hold just about anything you want to keep on hand - cans, 2-liter bottles and even frozen items with its compact 1/2 width freezer compartment, Its relatively small frame allows you to store it just about anywhere, and the reversible door design gives you added flexibility.

Our chic caddies keep your shampoo, lotion, soaps and other get-ready essentials organized so you can hit the shower in style. Even better, their breathable and durable mesh bottom design allows the shower water to drain easily and the caddies to dry quickly.

product: Textured Faux-Suede Charcoal Aiden Swivel Desk Chair
description: Give your desk modern style and timeless comfort with the Aiden Swivel Desk Chair. The curved, welted back and bucket seat provide sleek support, and smooth wheels ensure you’re always on a roll.
Stay cozy with a supersoft Recycled Sherpa blanket. Full of texture, warmth and in an array of classic colors, it's the perfect style to layer your sleep space.
